I'd skip the middleman altogether, and go strait to Turnbull's 
SOURCE - Papinot's "Historical and Geographical Dictonary of Japan" 
It's where most of Turnbulls bio's and information came from - he 
also faithfully reproduced some of the mistakes... yet doesnt 
actually SITE the book in his 'references' section....

CEWest



--- In samuraihistory@egroups.com, Dgaijin@a... wrote:
> if u guys need lineage then the book by Stephen Turnbull "The 
Samurai 
> Sourcebook" would help you guys,its an easy to find book and pretty 
useful 
> too. hope it helps you somehow.
